creator: Frank.Frost@gez.de
text:
I have developed a bean with the variable "hHf". The getter for this variable is 
named "getHHf()".
When trying to access this variable from a JSP with the following statement 
there is the error that no variable with this name can be found:
<jsp:getProperty name="Bean" property="hHf" />

When trying to access the variable with the following statement everything is 
ok:
<jsp:getProperty name="Bean" property="HHf" />

This seems to happen only when the second letter is in uppercase. Changing the 
name of the variable an the getter to something like "countHHf" and 
"getCountHHf()" solves the problem:
<jsp:getProperty name="Bean" property="countHHf" />

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Has workaround, will probably be resolved in a future version.
